title: Ep 158: Tired of Low Grades?  5 Ways to Raise Your Test Scores (and 1 Warning!)
description: But I studied!!  Don't be frustrated with low grades.  If you study RIGHT you will get good grades.  What what does that mean to study right?  I've got 5 techniques that will help you get better grades and one very important warning about something you may be doing that you have to stop! Find out how to study right in this episode of The Psych Files.
